get.description:
Retrieve all credit notes for a specific invoice or location. One of invoiceRef or locationRef is required.

OAuth

Required scopes: invoices.readonly or invoices

parameters.name: invoiceRef
parameters.description: The id of the invoice. One of invoiceRef or locationRef is required.

parameters.name: locationRef
parameters.description: The id of the location. One of invoiceRef or locationRef is required.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of items to return (max 100, default 25)

parameters.name: nextPageToken
parameters.description: Token for pagination to get the next page of results

parameters.name: spacebring-network-id
parameters.description: The id of the network. Required when using bearer token authentication

nextPageToken.description: Token to retrieve the next page of results

searchQueryNext.description: Full query string for the next page

404.description: Not Found - Invoice or location not found

get.description:
Retrieve all bookings of resources.

OAuth

Required scopes: resources.readonly or resources

parameters.name: resourceRef
parameters.description: The id of the resource. Required if `locationRef` is not passed.

parameters.name: locationRef
parameters.description: The id of the location. Required if `resourceRef` is not passed.

parameters.name: membershipRefOwner
parameters.description: The id of the membership owner.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The date filter of items.

lte.description: Get bookings with less or equal end date. Example: endDate[lte]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

gte.description: Get bookings with greater or equal end date. Example: endDate[gte]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

lt.description: Get bookings with less end date. Example: endDate[lt]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

gt.description: Get bookings with greater end date. Example: endDate[gt]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The date filter of items.

lte.description: Get bookings with less or equal start date. Example: startDate[lte]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

gte.description: Get bookings with greater or equal start date. Example: startDate[gte]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

lt.description: Get bookings with less start date. Example: startDate[lt]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

gt.description: Get bookings with greater start date. Example: startDate[gt]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: The order of filtered items. Format - `field:order`. Possible field values are `createDate`, `endDate`, `startDate`, `id`. Order values - `asc`, `desc`.

parameters.name: nextPageToken
parameters.description: nextPageToken retrieved from a previous request

parameters.name: types
parameters.description: The types of resources to retrieve bookings for. Pass them as comma separated values.

parameters.name: spacebring-network-id
parameters.description: The id of the network. Required when using bearer token authentication

parameters.name: spacebring-network-id
parameters.description: The id of the network. Required when using bearer token authentication

get.description:
Retrieve visits.

OAuth

Required scopes: visitors.readonly or visitors

parameters.name: locationRef
parameters.description: The id of the location.

parameters.name: userRefHost
parameters.description: The id of the user, host of the visit.

parameters.name: createDate
parameters.description: The date filter of items.

lte.description: Get visits with less or equal create date. Example: createDate[lte]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

gte.description: Get visits with greater or equal create date. Example: createDate[gte]=2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items to return

parameters.name: nextPageToken
parameters.description: nextPageToken retrieved from a previous request

parameters.description: The id of the network. Required when using bearer token authentication

scopes.benefits: Read and write benefits and applications
scopes.community: Read and write community companies and memberships
scopes.events: Read and write events and tickets
scopes.resources: Read and write resources and bookings
scopes.shop: Read and write products and orders

dateSchema.description: The date and time in ISO 8601 format, e.g. 2021-05-21T10:00:00Z

altPostPaymentAmount.description: Post payment amount in alternative currency

altPrePaymentAmount.description: Pre payment amount in alternative currency

altTotalExcludingTaxAmount.description: Total excluding tax amount in alternative currency
Total excluding tax amount in alternative currency

altUnitExcludingTaxAmount.description: Unit excluding tax amount in alternative currency

currencyCode.description: The currency code of the payment

invoiceItemRef.description: The reference ID of the invoice item

transactionRef.description: The reference ID of the transaction

metadata.description: Use to attach key-value data to the object. Available only for admins.

liked.description: Whether the user has liked the comment

likes.description: The number of likes the comment has

photoUrl.description: The URL of the user's photo

parentCommentRef.description: The ID of the parent comment. If the comment is a reply, this will be the ID of the parent comment. If the comment is a top-level comment, this property won't be present.

amountOff.description: One of amountOff or percentOff must be present.

currencyCode.description: Currency code exists if amountOff is present.

percentOff.description: One of amountOff or percentOff must be present.

number.description: Unique identifier of ticket in location.

type.description: The type of membership. Default value is member.

email.description: An invitation letter will be sent to the given email.

issueFirstInvoice.description: If true, the first invoice will be issued.
